message.body: Going to be the only person in the pool
Yikes! Wish I could be with you but my swimsuit bit the dust, lol. I have a new one coming tomorrow
Ha! Can't wait to see it! Maybe Thurs?
If the weather is good, definitely! I might go tomorrow too if the suit comes in time
I have a happy hour tomorrow but Thurs should work, again weather and work permitting.
